response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's not just any item; it's an investment in efficiency and innovation tailored specifically to meet your needs. Given its value to you, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 9500}
